mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS report_id, r.title AS report_title, CONCAT(emp_info.first_name, ' ', emp_info.last_name) AS employee_name, r.created_at AS created_at FROM reports r JOIN users emp_info ON r.created_by = emp_info.id JOIN employees emp_extended_info ON emp_info.id = emp_extended_info.id WHERE emp_extended_info.manager_id = #{id} AND r.is_read = 0
SELECT id, title, content, created_at, employee_id, task_id, is_read FROM reports WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT r.id AS report_id, r.title AS report_title, CONCAT(e.first_name, ' ', e.last_name) AS employee_name, r.created_at AS created_at FROM reports r JOIN users e ON r.employee_id = e.id WHERE r.is_read = 0 AND r.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT r.id AS report_id, r.title AS report_title, CONCAT(e.first_name, ' ', e.last_name) AS employee_name, r.created_at AS created_at FROM reports r JOIN users e ON r.employee_id = e.id WHERE r.task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT u.id AS id, u.first_name AS first_name, u.last_name AS last_name, u.email AS email, u.password AS password, u.role AS role, u.is_locked AS is_locked FROM users u WHERE u.id = ( SELECT emp.manager_id FROM employees emp WHERE emp.id = ( SELECT r.employee_id FROM reports r WHERE r.id = #{reportId} ) )
